title: URW Craw Modern Bold
content:
I loved this font when I saw it in one of the topics. I don’t usually do things with commercial fonts, but occasionally make exceptions. Quote is by a mafia guy on trial. Jimmy “Blue eyes” or something like that.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222041135im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/craw2.gif)

I just love this font. Thanks to whoever it was for pointing it out.

 [‹ Font for my Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222041135/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19413 "Go to previous forum topic") [a gay typeface? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222041135/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18946 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer
